page.title: 19School Holidays in Rugeley
page.content: The school year is divided into 3 terms, Autumn term, Spring term and Winter term. At the end of each term is a holiday, usually 2 weeks long, but the summer holiday lasts for 6 weeks. During the week Saturday and Sunday are days we do not go to school, when we can do what we like. In the middle of each term we have half term holidays which last for 1 week. How the holidays are spent is a matter of choice. Most families go away for a holiday at least once a year, usually to the seaside, either in Great Britain or abroad.
